targets.target: select  health_concerning_rate * 100 as "concerning health", health_bad_rate * 100 as "bad health", health_disabled_rate * 100 as "disabled health", health_unknown_rate * 100 as "unknown health" where entityName=hdfs
select dfs_capacity, dfs_capacity_used, dfs_capacity_used_non_hdfs where entityName=hdfs
